abstract: The Dutch Finance Ministry announced that deadline to sell assets from either ABN Amro or Fortis Netherlands before they are allowed to merge had been extended until October 19 by Neelie Kroes.
snippet: The Dutch Finance Ministry announced that deadline to sell assets from either ABN Amro or Fortis Netherlands before they are allowed to merge had been extended until October 19 by Neelie Kroes.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:30 p.m. Late Friday, the Dutch Finance Ministry announced that the deadline to sell assets from either ABN Amro or Fortis Netherlands before they are allowed to merge had been extended until Oct. 19 by Neelie Kroes, the European Union competition commissioner.

headline.main: Dutch Deadline for Fortis-ABN Sale Extended
